import { useState } from 'react'; import { Events, Connections } from './data'; import SettingsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Settings'; export default function Main() { const [showManageTimeLine, setShowManageTimeline] = useState(false); const [selectedStep, setSelectedStep] = useState(null); return ( <>
{showManageTimeLine && (
Manage your timeline
{selectedStep && ( Events.filter(e => e.stepId === selectedStep - 1).map(event => (
{event.name}
)) )}
)} ) }
